title: Senior Capstone Project
description: Developed a secure and scalable web application for the U.S. Department of Defense, focusing on data-driven decision-making while adhering to strict compliance and security standards.

title: Software Engineering Project
description: Developed a series of software development projects focusing on real-world applications. Projects include GUI-based bookstore management system, dynamic Ping Pong game, Pizza ordering & a Bug Tracking system.

title: Turtle Project, Python
description: Developed a Python-based animation story using the Turtle library and it's graphics. The project includes features turtle movement, and all different nature oriented scenarios.
